abstract: Three Americans -- Alex Morgan, Hope Solo and Abby Wambach -- are among the 10 women nominated for FIFA's women's world player of the year award.
snippet: Three Americans -- Alex Morgan, Hope Solo and Abby Wambach -- are among the 10 women nominated for FIFA's women's world player of the year award.
lead_paragraph: Will this be the year that Marta will be dethroned as the winner of FIFA's women's world player of the year? Marta, a skillful Brazilian, has won the award for the past five years and was among the 10 players nominated Wednesday for this year's award.

headline.main: Ladies' Day: FIFA's List of 10 for Women's Player of the Year
